"Nanking" (N/A) starring Chris Mulkey and Michelle Krusiec is a thought-provoking historical film that explores the complex history of the Sino-Japanese Affair. It's a poignant and critically acclaimed portrayal of the conflict.

"The Sword in the Stone" (1938) starring Arthur Rubinstein and Claude Rains is a classic alternate history tale about a poor boy's journey to become a legendary king. Its inspiring message and timeless themes make it a compelling watch.
